channel.title: [PI] textures
channel.description: Ground textures for pi... where are they and where do I get 508 hd textures for my 317? Don't tell me google

item.title: [PI] textures
item.dc:creator: @chri55w chri55w
item.description:
@chri55w wrote:

facepalm you dont change the ip server side, the server runs on a main pc then the clients connect to that pc, in your cleint.java search for

put yout ip there then compile and run

if you only want to connect via localhost put “127.0.0.1” or “0.0.0.0”

if you put your ip or want others to connect then you need to portforward < this may also be why you cant connect
